name: Pengu Island
description:
Welcome
Pengu Island is a clicker and idlegame, with the idea to build it without any paywalls.
I think everyone who hears the word Pay to Win gets a thick neck.
I have spent many hours playing idlegames where you can only get ahead by watching ads an buying premium currency.
This principle resembles a casino and I distance myself from such sick makers.
I would like to do this differently with Pengu Island!
I want to develop a game that you can start easily without fear of sacrificing your monthly salary to achieve something.
I want that you just have fun playing and that with cute penguins.

Story
The task in Pengu Island is to earn the currency Fishy.
With this currency you can buy "Pengus"(Penguins) and they will take over your work step by step.
To make the game easier and easier, because it should be a little more difficult at the beginning, so that you have not played through the game immediately , there is a prestige system.
If you have used the prestige system, you will receive Goldencoins.
Per Goldencoin you get 1% more revenue on your purchased goods.
More things are planned to keep the game fun as long as possible.
